Package game.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.entities.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Printable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Monster, Player
    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Printable
    Represents an entity in the game with various attributes expected to be inherited by non-abstract classes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String desc,
              int healthPoints,
              int maxDamage,
              boolean ownsConsumables,
              boolean ownsKeyring)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the entity.
        desc - Description of the entity.
        healthPoints - The entity's health-points in natural numbers.
        maxDamage - Maximal damage output of the entity.
        ownsConsumables - true if entity owns consumables.
        ownsKeyring - true if entity owns keyring.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If a value equal to or less than zero is entered as value for the health-points or max. damage.

      • useConsumablesWithCommand

        public void useConsumablesWithCommand​(char c)
        Apply the effect of a consumable with the corresponding command.
        Parameters:
        c - Command assigned to the consumable for use.

      • hasKeyForRoom

        public boolean hasKeyForRoom​(Room room)
        Checks the entity's keyring for a key that opens the door, which leads to the room in question.
        Parameters:
        room - The room in which the door expected to be opened with the key leads to.
        Returns:
        true if the entity has a key for opening a door to the expected room. false otherwise.
